title: Lemon chicken pasta salad
ingredients: ['9kg skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cooked, cut into bite-sized pieces', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '2.25kg penne pasta, cooked, cooled', '1kg mayonnaise, or as needed', '2 lemons, zest only', '250ml lemon juice', '2 teaspoons freshly chopped dill']
